target_url.title: Target URL
target_url.description: The URL to monitor for changes.

selector.title: CSS selector (optional)
selector.description: Optional CSS selector to watch only a specific part of the page (e.g. .price, #stock-count).

webhook_url.title: Webhook URL
webhook_url.description: Callback URL to POST change events to.

webhook_headers.title: Webhook headers (optional)
webhook_headers.description: Extra headers to include in the webhook request.

webhook_secret.title: Webhook secret (optional)
webhook_secret.description: If set, the payload will be signed and sent with an X-Sentinel-Signature header.

baseline_mode.title: Baseline behavior
baseline_mode.description: What to do on the first run when no previous snapshot exists.

state_store_name.title: State store name
state_store_name.description: Key-Value Store name used to persist previous snapshots across runs.

dead_letter_dataset_name.title: Dead-letter dataset name
dead_letter_dataset_name.description: Dataset name where failed webhook deliveries will be stored for later inspection/replay.

timeout_secs.title: Timeout (seconds)
timeout_secs.description: Timeout applied to page fetches and webhook delivery.

max_redirects.title: Max redirects
max_redirects.description: Maximum number of redirects to follow when fetching the target URL.

max_content_bytes.title: Max content bytes
max_content_bytes.description: Maximum number of bytes to download from the target response body.

ignore_selectors.title: Ignore selectors (optional)
ignore_selectors.description: CSS selectors to remove before extracting content (noise reduction).

ignore_regexes.title: Ignore regexes (optional)
ignore_regexes.description: Regex patterns to scrub from extracted text (e.g. timestamps, tokens). Supports either plain patterns or /pattern/flags.

redact_logs.title: Redact logs
redact_logs.description: Redact sensitive-looking values (tokens/secrets) in logs and datasets.
